## Setting up an Account

::: columns
::: {.column .fragment}
![](./Images/setting-up.png) [Source](www.pexels.com)
:::

::: {.column .fragment}
1.  Website: [www.zoom.com](https://zoom.us/)

2.  [Zoom Sign Up](https://zoom.us/signup#/signup)

    -   Enter birth year
    -   Enter email

3.  Zoom sends you an email

    -   [Check the code](./Images/check-code.png)

<!-- -->

4.  [Sign up your account](./Images/create-account.png)
:::
:::

::: footer
Learn more: [Zoom Sign Up](https://zoom.us/signup#/signup)
:::

## How to schedule your first meeting

::: columns
::: {.column .fragment}
![](./Images/schedule-meeting.png){width="300"}

-   2 main ways to connect
    -   Zoom Web
    -   Zoom App
:::

::: column
1.  [Sign in to your account](https://zoom.us/signin)
    -   enter your email
    -   enter your password
2.  [Meetings](https://zoom.us/meeting#/upcoming)
    -   Click **Schedule a Meeting\
        **![](Images/schedule-button.png){width="300" height="80"}
:::
:::

::: footer
Learn more: [Getting started with Zoom](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360034967471-Getting-started-guide-for-new-users)
:::
